name: Hatchling (Grim 👁️)
description:
You were murdered two years ago. It didn't take.

✦

You are the most recently-hatched member of a quadrumvirate of lich-lords. You rely upon them now for guidance as you navigate your new existence as something undead, something unfinished, something reborn.

✦

HATCHLING is a tiny Bitsy+Twine demo for a larger story I'm thinking about working on this year. It's also a sequel of sorts to my Divination Jam entry, AUGUR & HARUSPEX, but you don't need to have played A&H to understand this game.

Made for the Egg Bitsy Jam with Twine® and Bitsy by Adam Le Doux, also using Borksy by AYolland with hacks by Sean S. LeBlanc.
